prompt_base: muscular man, piercing blue eyes, long flowing white hair, rugged facial features, determined expression, 8k cinematic photo, outdoor lighting
feature_prompt: visible skin texture, subtle scars, individual flowing hair strands, detailed fabric weave on clothing, canvas hat material, metal buckle texture
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, smooth hair, deformed, low quality, blurry face, (deformed hat:1.2), too soft skin, feminine
